title: Functional anatomy of the hand (TEFC)
brief_description: Dissection of a human hand and arm shows the functional anatomy of the hand. Identifies the nerves and tendons responsible for the movement of hand and individual fingers and presents the procedures and precautions necessary for hand surgery.
description: Dissection of a human hand and arm shows the functional anatomy of the hand. Identifies the nerves and tendons responsible for the movement of hand and individual fingers and presents the procedures and precautions necessary for hand surgery.
